Key Match Events: Tommy Kahnle allowed a go-ahead, two-run homer in the eighth inning.
Nick Gonzalez and Bryan Reynolds hit back-to-back homers to open the sixth inning.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. drove in the Yankees' two runs with a single in the fifth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm Jr. expressed the team's goal to reach the World Series and not just the playoffs.
Carlos Rodon reflected on the excitement of starting in the postseason and the difference from last year.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. expressed excitement and confidence in the team's talent and teamwork.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Carlos Rodon set a career high with his 32nd start of the year.
Trent Grisham made two fantastic running catches on deep fly balls to center.
Jose Trevino threw out a pair of would-be base-stealers.
